parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the account that contains the VPC connection that you want described.

parameters.name: VPCConnectionId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPC connection that you're creating. This ID is a unique identifier for each Amazon Web Services Region in an Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: VPCConnection
nested_items.description: A response object that provides information for the specified VPC connection.

nested_items.name: VPCConnectionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the VPC connection that you're creating. This ID is a unique identifier for each Amazon Web Services Region in an Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the VPC connection.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The display name for the VPC connection.

nested_items.name: VPCId
nested_items.description: The Amazon EC2 VPC ID associated with the VPC connection.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The Amazon EC2 security group IDs associated with the VPC connection.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DnsResolvers
nested_items.description: A list of IP addresses of DNS resolver endpoints for the VPC connection.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the VPC connection.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityStatus
nested_items.description: The availability status of the VPC connection.

nested_items.name: NetworkInterfaces
nested_items.description: A list of network interfaces.

nested_items.name: SubnetId
nested_items.description: The subnet ID associated with the network interface.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: The availability zone that the network interface resides in.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: An error message.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the network interface.

nested_items.name: NetworkInterfaceId
nested_items.description: The network interface ID.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role associated with the VPC connection.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The time that the VPC connection was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The time that the VPC connection was last updated.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
